sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_macro_022419eadba74010ea8be9c9489619ce
sys_update_xml.payload:
truegeneralInformations detaillees sur la demandeoptical_fiber_request_formatter_ui_macrosys_ui_macroadmin2020-03-17 11:13:24022419eadba74010ea8be9c9489619ce4optical_fiber_request_formatter_ui_macroglobalglobalsys_ui_macro_022419eadba74010ea8be9c9489619ceadmin2020-03-17 12:42:50 function eval_cat_item() { var cat_item = ""; var catItemProducedGr = new GlideRecord("sc_item_produced_record"); catItemProducedGr.addQuery("record_key", current.getUniqueValue()); catItemProducedGr.query(); if (catItemProducedGr.next()) cat_item = catItemProducedGr.getValue("producer"); console.log(cat_item); return cat_item.ninea; } eval_cat_item(); var jvar_cat_sets = ""; var gr = new GlideRecord("io_set_item"); gr.addQuery("sc_cat_item", jelly.jvar_catalog_item); gr.addQuery("variable_set.type", "one_to_one"); gr.query(); while (gr.next()) { if (jvar_cat_sets.length > 0) jvar_cat_sets += ","; jvar_cat_sets += gr.variable_set; } jvar_cat_sets; !current.canWrite();
]]>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_80792059db674010ea8be9c9489619b5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:5b965998dba30010ea8be9c948961979</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>ckeck office number on change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	
	var fixe_regex = /\b3(?:0(?:1[0-2]|80)|282|3(?:8[1-9]|9[3-9])|611)\d{5}\b/;
	var fixe_number = g_form.getValue('telephone_bureau');
	if(!fixe_regex.test(fixe_number)){
		g_form.showErrorBox('telephone_bureau','Numéro téléphone incorrect');
		return false;
	}
	else g_form.hideFieldMsg('telephone_bureau');

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-13 10:54:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>80792059db674010ea8be9c9489619b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ckeck office number on change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_80792059db674010ea8be9c9489619b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 13:32:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_2e0bbaa0dbe30010ea8be9c9489619e1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:1fcc0aa0db230010ea8be9c94896190c</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Afficher la description de l'offre</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if(isLoading) {
      return;
   }
	
	if(newValue==1){
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('description_offre_pro',true);
		enordisable(1,true);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',true);

	}
	else if(newValue==2){
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('description_offre_office',true);
		enordisable(2,true);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',true);

	}
	else if(newValue==3){
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',true);
		g_form.setReadOnly('description_offre_office_intense',true);
		enordisable(3,true);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',true);
	}
	else{
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',false);
		g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',false);
		g_form.setMandatory('forfait',false);
		enordisable(0,false);
		return;
	}
	
	function enordisable(offre, param){
		g_form.setDisplay('forfait',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('options_supplementaires',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('tv_orange',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('bouquet_canalsat',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('access',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('evasion',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('tout_canal',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('chaines_canal',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('web_sms',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_fixe_mono',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_fix_multi',param);
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-11 13:35:42</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2e0bbaa0dbe30010ea8be9c9489619e1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Afficher la description de l'offre</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2e0bbaa0dbe30010ea8be9c9489619e1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 13:16:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_f00be499db674010ea8be9c948961982
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:4487555cdba30010ea8be9c948961954</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>check if phone is correct when change</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var mobile_regex = /\b7(?:[06-8]\d|21|90)\d{6}\b/;
	var phone_number = g_form.getValue('telephone_mobile');
	if(!mobile_regex.test(phone_number)){
		g_form.showErrorBox('telephone_mobile','Numéro incorrect');
	}
	if(!phone_number.match('^[0-9]*$')){
		setTimeout(function(){
			g_form.setValue('telephone_mobile','');
		},1000);
	}

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-13 11:00:30</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>f00be499db674010ea8be9c948961982</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>check if phone is correct when change</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_f00be499db674010ea8be9c948961982</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 13:32:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: check if phone is correct when change

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_ui_policy_bf337d54db270010ea8be9c9489619d0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:2784d998dba30010ea8be9c948961968=3^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>true</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() {

}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() {
	g_form.setDisabled('passport',true);
	g_form.setDisabled('autres',true);
	console.log(g_form.getValue('piece_identite'));

}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>when other is selected</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-10 13:43:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bf337d54db270010ea8be9c9489619d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>when other is selected</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_bf337d54db270010ea8be9c9489619d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 12:51:25</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_cd58fcd5dba74010ea8be9c9489619fb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>hide description when form is loaded</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_pro',false);
	g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office',false);
	g_form.setDisplay('description_offre_office_intense',false);
	enordisable(false);
	
	function enordisable(param){
		g_form.setDisplay('forfait',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('options_supplementaires',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('tv_orange',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('bouquet_canalsat',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('access',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('evasion',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('tout_canal',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('chaines_canal',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('web_sms',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_fixe_mono',param);
		g_form.setDisplay('ip_fixe_multi',param);
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-13 11:58:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cd58fcd5dba74010ea8be9c9489619fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>hide description when form is loaded</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cd58fcd5dba74010ea8be9c9489619fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 13:32:22</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: hide description when form is loaded

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Demande fibre">a41e0d50dba30010ea8be9c9489619ec</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:2c336d18dbe30010ea8be9c9489619bd</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Verification de la date de delivrance</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
	var today = Date.now();
	var date = new Date(newValue);
	if(date>=today){
		g_form.showErrorBox("date_delivrance","la date doit être dans le passé");
		setTimeout(function(){g_form.setValue('date_delivrance','');},3000);
		return;
	}
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-03-17 10:01:53</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0f62c9aadb674010ea8be9c9489619c7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Verification de la date de delivrance</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_0f62c9aadb674010ea8be9c9489619c7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-03-17 13:32:34</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_xml.target_name: Verification de la date de delivrance
